summary:
I'm a choreographer and musician based in The Netherlands, with many years of experience in contemporary dance as well as in alternative music. 
After graduating from The National Ballet School Of Canada in 1997 I came to Holland where I danced for Nederlands Dans Theater for nine years.
In 2005 I created my first choreography, Track, for NDT. The piece was very well received and the following year I decided to dedicate myself full-time to my own creative projects. I then created several performances for Korzo Productions in The Hague as well as for Holland Dance Festival and Aura Dance Company (Lithuania). 
In 2012 I co-founded OFF Projects, a collective with whom I create multi-disciplinary performances and events. With OFFprojects I've presented my work all over The Netherlands as well as in Germany, France, Czech Republic and the UK. 
Since a young age I've been involved in music. I'm the lead singer and song-writer of the indie-rock band Noblesse, and I compose all the music for my choreographies as well as for other choreographers such as Johan Inger and Ana Reti among others. 
Bellow you can read more about my various activities and please don't hesitate to contact me if you have a question.

awards.title: Dioraphte Dance Prize 2016
awards.description:
OFF Projects / Amos Ben-Tal won the Dioraphte Dance Prize 2016 at the Nederlandse Dansdagen for HOWL. A collaboration with musician Spinvis, Howl is a crossover between a talkshow, dance performance and concert.

“It is not only the multidisciplinary form of HOWL that makes the production suitable for an international tour. Probably a more important element of the piece is the way Amos Ben-Tal enters into a dialogue with the audience, a necessary concept within nowadays society. By searching for the diversity, the complex and at the same time universal and common ground of humankind, Amos invites us for a conversation. Supported by the exceptional skills of the performers, he makes us become aware of our own humanity.”

profile_positions.description:
OFFprojects is a new group consisting of former dancers of Nederlands Dans Theater and Batsheva Ensemble, gathered around the work of choreographer and musician Amos Ben-Tal. Founded in 2012, the group creates multi-disciplinary performances and events using dance, music, text and visual art. OFFprojects believe in work that is raw and modular, while being challenging and appealing at the same time. In March 2014 OFFprojects premiered their first full-evening production OFFline. The show received rave reviews and was soon followed by their second full-length, the equally well received Might. In its short existence the group has already performed extensively all over The Netherlands and abroad and has presented installations and live-music nights at festivals such as Cadance and Holland Dance Festival. 
The group’s uniqueness is in that every member has a secondary expertise except for dancing, resulting in every aspect of the production being done in-house and forming part of a conceptual whole. Except for Amos the group further consists of Aurélie Cayla (coordinator/education), Yvan Dubreuil (dramturgy) and Milena Twiehaus (design and media).
profile_positions.title: Artistic Leader

profile_positions.description:
My activities and services include: 
- Choreography: Except for my works with OFFprojects and Korzo I also accept choreography commissions for companies and occasionally for schools. 
- Music Composition: As a composer I've written the music for all of my own dance pieces, as well as for other choreographers such as Johan Inger, Lesley Telford, Ana Reti and Marne and Imre van Opstal.
-  I've developed my own way to train both myself as well as the dancers I work with. I can teach this as a daily training or as workshop. I've taught at (among others) Nederlands Dans Theater, Codarts Rotterdam, Artez College of The Arts Arnhem, Kunsthumaniora Belgium, Centro Andaluz de Danza Sevilla Spain. 
- On occasion I work as rehearsal director for Kylian Productions. I've set Kylian pieces at Introdans, Ballet Mainz, Cedar Lake Contemporary Ballet (NYC) and São Paulo Companhia de Dança.
- I'm quite handy with theater technique (sound, light etc). On occasion I work as a technical assistant and consultant.
- I do recording/production/editing/mixing of music and record demos for bands etc.

profile_positions.description:
since 2005 I've been performing and recording with my band Noblesse (incl Shahar Horev on Bass and Kees Zuurbier on drums).
We've released two EPs: Four Song Demo (2005) and We Are Not A Demo (2009)
and three full-length albums: Sound The Alarm (2006), We Are Not Humanity (2010) and most recently NOTHINGISANYTHING(2015).

Noblesse has played all over The Netherlands in venues such as Paradiso, Melkweg, Paard van Troje, Waterfront, Patronaat, P3, Supermarkt and more... as well as in Belgium, UK, Israel and Germany. Our shows are very dynamic (see show-reel) and are often accompanied by video-art and sometimes dance.

Noblesse played support for bands such as Silversun Pickups, Keith Caputo and Metal Molly and worked with the producers Henk Koorn (Hallo Venray) and Gordon Raphael (The Strokes).
